domains.title: Time
domains.description: Time systems, UTC/ET conversions, SCLK, and time constants.

domains.title: Kernel management
domains.description: Kernel bookkeeping: listing, querying, extracting, clearing.

domains.title: Kernel pool
domains.description: Kernel pool read/write/query utilities (the shared variable pool).

domains.title: IDs â†” names
domains.description: Body/frame/surface ID and name translation utilities.

domains.title: Frames & attitude (CK)
domains.description: Reference frame transformations, attitude representations, and CK routines.

domains.title: Ephemeris (SPK)
domains.description: SPK access and SPK segment writing/coverage/object utilities (plus closely-related state/orbit helpers).

domains.title: Planetary constants (PCK)
domains.description: PCK access and PCK kernel utilities.

domains.title: Digital shape kernels (DSK)
domains.description: DSK access, DSK segment writing, and shape model utilities.

domains.title: Event kernels (EK)
domains.description: EK access, segment building, query, and EK I/O utilities.

domains.title: Geometry & event finding
domains.description: Geometric computations (subpoints, intercepts, illumination, occultations, FOV) and GF event finding.

domains.title: Coordinates, vectors, matrices
domains.description: Coordinate conversions and core vector/matrix/rotation utilities.

domains.title: Cells & windows
domains.description: SpiceCell set operations and window operations (WN* routines).

domains.title: Low-level file I/O (DAF/DAS/DLA)
domains.description: Low-level DAF/DAS/DLA architecture routines and file record operations.

domains.title: Strings & parsing
domains.description: String utilities not otherwise classified (search, replace, word parsing, formatting).

domains.title: Math & numerics
domains.description: Numerical utilities (Chebyshev polynomials, interpolation, root finding, regression).

domains.title: Error handling
domains.description: Error system entry/exit, message formatting, and failure-state routines.

domains.title: TBD (needs review)
domains.description: Uncertain classification; grouped here for follow-up review.
